sen.j: 今出川公香（いまでがわ きんよし、元禄4年5月1日 (旧暦)（1691年5月28日）‐享保6年11月14日 (旧暦)（1722年1月1日））は、江戸時代中期の公卿。
sen.e: Kinyoshi Imadegawa (May 28, 1691-January 1, 1722) was a Kugyo (a Court noble) duing the middle of the Edo period.
Kinyoshi Imadegawa (May 28, 1691-January 1, 1722) was a Kugyo (a Court noble) duing the middle of the Edo period.
Kinyoshi Imadegawa (May 28, 1691-January 1, 1722) was a Kugyo (a Court noble) duing the middle of the Edo period.

sen.j: 父は右大臣今出川伊季。
sen.e: His father was udaijin (minister of the right) Koresue IMADEGAWA.
His father was udaijin (minister of the right) Koresue IMADEGAWA.
His father was udaijin (minister of the right) Koresue IMADEGAWA.
His mother is not known.
His mother is not known.
His mother is not known.

sen.j: 弟に権大納言今出川公詮がいる。
sen.e: His younger brother was Dainagon (chief councilor of state) Kinakira IMADEGAWA).
His younger brother was Gon Dainagon (a provisional chief councilor of state) Kinakira IMADEGAWA).
sen.cmt: ウィキに合わせて、原文を以下のように修正し、訳文も修正しました。大納言→権大納言
sen.e: His younger brother was Gon Dainagon (a provisional chief councilor of state) Kinakira IMADEGAWA).
In 1692, he was conferred a peerage.
In 1692, he was conferred a peerage.
In 1692, he was conferred a peerage.

sen.j: 以降累進して、侍従・左近衛少将・左近衛中将を経て、宝永2年（1705年）に従三位となり、公卿に列する。
sen.e: After that, he became Palace staff, Konoefu (the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards), and in 1795, he became Jusanmi; Jusani (Junior Third Rank) and ranked with Kugyo (the top court officials).

After that, he was gradually promoted taking various positions such as a Palace staff, Sakone no shosho (Minor Captain of the Left Division of Inner Palace Guards) and Sakone no chujo (Middle Captain of the Left Division of Inner Palace Guards), and in 1705, he was conferred Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) and ranked with Kugyo (the top court officials).
sen.cmt: 「1705年」が「1795年」と誤訳されていたので、修正しました。ウィキに合わせて、原文を以下のように修正し、訳文も修正しました。近衛府→左近衛少将近衛府→左近衛中将
sen.e: After that, he was gradually promoted taking various positions such as a Palace staff, Sakone no shosho (Minor Captain of the Left Division of Inner Palace Guards) and Sakone no chujo (Middle Captain of the Left Division of Inner Palace Guards), and in 1705, he was conferred Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) and ranked with Kugyo (the top court officials).

sen.j: しかし宝永3年（1706年）「所労」を理由に東山天皇に官位官職を返上して出た。
sen.e: However, in 1706, he returned the official rank and government post to Emperor Higashiyama for the reason of fatigue.
However, in 1706, he returned the official rank and government post to Emperor Higashiyama due to fatigue.
sen.cmt: 「for the reason of」を「due to」に変更しました。
sen.e: However, in 1706, he returned the official rank and government post to Emperor Higashiyama due to fatigue.

sen.j: その後は無位無官の一般人になっている。
sen.e: After that, he became an ordinary peson with no rank.
After that, he became an ordinary peson with no rank.
After that, he became an ordinary peson with no rank.

sen.j: このため今出川家では急遽弟の伊季を当主となした。
sen.e: For this reason, Koresue became the head of the Imadegawa family.
For this reason, his younger brother, Koresue became the head of the Imadegawa family.
sen.cmt: 「弟」が抜けていたので、追記しました。
sen.e: For this reason, his younger brother, Koresue became the head of the Imadegawa family.
